Class TextareaTag

All Implemented Interfaces:
BodyTag, IterationTag, JspTag, Tag, Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
NestedTextareaTag
public class TextareaTag extends BaseInputTag
Custom tag for input fields of type "textarea".
Version:
